title: Poll on armor pen %
body: Just wondering who thinks armor pen is still hurting tanks as being % still being on items

replies.body: While it may hurt, i think its % HP true damage on a certain Assassin/ADC hybrid, that is the real problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=gPY0Ttfq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-26T07:03:18.775+0000)
>
> While it may hurt, i think its % HP true damage on a certain Assassin/ADC hybrid, that is the real problem.

This guy knows what's up, also firoas apssive does it too.
yes but that isnt the op situation :)
